articles.title: 5-km-long landslide on Mars captured by European orbiter | See photos - India TV News
articles.description: Landslides are geomorphological processes occurring under specific environmental conditions. On Mars as on Earth, they come in various shapes and sizes, and Earth analogues are used to understand similar processes seen on planetary bodies.
articles.content: The European Space Agency (ESA) has shared stunning images of a 5-km long landslide on Mars. According to the space agency, Exo-Mars Orbiter which is hovering above the Red Planet captured the landsl… [+1286 chars]
